website_summaries.verdict: An oldie, but a goodie. This classic toy will be a crowd favorite.
pros: Includes 15 mini pots of Play-Doh in various colors and 15 customizable gift tags
Non-toxic dough is safe for kids
Inspires creativity and provides stress relief
Quality plastic pots keep dough from drying out
cons: Does not come with an equal number of each color, variety varies

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for pink play-doh...then order these!
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the fact that there were more of one color then the rest. Ordered two bags of these for classroom party fillers and they had the same number of colors in both which didn't work as boys typically don't play with pink or purple play-doh. Are they assorted colors? Yes. However..the amount of one color is significantly more then the rest in both bags.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Great for Party Favors!
customer_reviews.text: Play-Doh has been a staple in our house for many years. It is trusted for quality and safety. It is non toxic. Play-Doh is easy for kids to use, but is also a great stress reliever for adults as well. We have given it to my stepfather as part of his therapy after a stroke. We love the individual party size containers! They make great prizes, stocking stuffers or rewards! Fits perfect in a goody bag for those birthday parties as well! Great price and convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Party favors, on the go activity, rewards...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a party party favor. But, loved the sizing of these, that I ordered another bag for traveling. Small, compact and easy to pack. 15 different color options. Which is ideal for multiple kid households = less fighting. Automatic win in my book. I threw 2 in each of our “on the go” bags. Tossed a couple in our vehicles. The rest went into reward bin. The kids loved the dough as a party favor! Several parents asked where I had purchased. They wanted to purchase too. These little containers of play dough would be perfect for teachers, churches, camps, parties, travel or even on the go bags!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Not Normal Play-Doh Consistency
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the Play-Doh containers and my son love the variety of colors. That being said I hate the consistency of this particular pack of Play-Doh. It is very sticky and hard to maneuver, it is NOT the normal putty like consistency. I have purposely left the containers open so it will dry out a bit and be easier to handle. If you are giving it away as favors and it is not staying in your home then by all means purchase this pack. If it is staying in your house then heaven help you because you will be waiting for it to dry to then peel/chip off after it is stuck all over EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Gotta ❤️Play-Doh
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like about Play-Doh? Only downside here is with the container, not the product. Although I do realize the tops need to be tight to keep Play-Doh from drying out, these require an implement to open. Just be prepared. I purchased these as Halloween treats for children who cannot have candy. ( Put them in a teal colored plastic pumpkin- that is apparently the universal signal to kids & parents that the contents are OK for kids w/ health issues. EXCEPT kids with celiac disease- PlayDoh has gluten in it!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tiny Play-Doh! 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in the favor boxes for my son's birthday party and they're perfect! I bought two packs and can't believe how inexpensive they were! Especially for brand name Play-Doh! They are the tiny ones meant for parties so keep that in mind in case your looking for larger ones. They also came with 16 "To & From" stickers that look like they'll fit perfectly on top of the container! They're perfect for what I needed and exactly what I wanted! 😁💟
customer_reviews.author: Lis 🔮

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in goodie bags at a birthday party. They were all upright and in order when they arrived, that's a plus with how hot it was outside. They come with little gift tag stickers and the colors are as to be expected with the Play-Doh brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: More cost effective for me
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these a couple of times for “prizes” for my grandchildren. They help to keep potty training and learning to share fun. I thought about the fact that the larger containers are more cost effective, but these little ones are enough to make them happy. Also, the little one tends to mix all colors together, producing a lovely drab-grey color, after which it is no longer desirable. So, in the long run, the smaller ones are cheaper for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to add to our Halloween treats for kids with food allergies, and these were perfect. Bright neon colors, and would be the ideal size to give away as party favors. They were a big hit with the kids, and will purchase again next Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Chubby Mako

customer_reviews.title: Small containers of Play-Doh - nice variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a Valentine's Day card for my toddler's daycare class (a-doh-rable). I'm including a picture so you can see the assortment of colors I received. Some neons (and repeats) and some primary colors. The Play-Doh seemed fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great little set for a birthday party. They are mini as well and come with birthday stickers. I actually bought for my son because I wanted to give him a variety of colors but not the full size ones and risk it being an even bigger mess and mix up. He loves them and they’re honestly the perfect amount for a 4 year old. Packaged great, great price, diff colors, and they weren’t dry and haven’t dried out. Def a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween treat bags, party favors and restaurant bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to give away at Trunk or Treat at my son's preschool. They were a huge hit and a nice alternative to candy. The ones that were left over I put in my son's restaurant bag (a bag of activities and toys we take into restaurants to help keep him occupied). They are a huge hit. Because they are small they don't make a huge mess and it keeps him entertained before and after the meal. I'll purchase these again next year...you can never have too much play-doh with toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: HTHONLINE

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Can you go wrong with a play doh set? If you’re a parent, you know...it’s entertainment regardless of the mess your child is going to make. Regardless of the cringeworthy mixing of colors...this sets going to buy you time to go to the bathroom... alone.. maybe start a load of laundry, rewarm your coffee, put on actual clothes...or time to just sit and breath. If you’re a parent, buy the set.
customer_reviews.author: Haleym4

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and perfect size for party favors.
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my baby shower game "Let's Make a Baby" and they were the perfect size. The play-doh brand is always fresh, so I didn't have to worry about a stale or hard product showing up before my shower. I also purchased once before this time to use for party favors for my toddlers 2 bday. They are always a hit with the kiddos (maybe not parents!) and again they were a quality product that arrived. I will continue to order for favors and just to have around for my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: LO.MTZ

customer_reviews.title: Repeat colors
customer_reviews.text: They are a good amount for the price but I just with they’ve different color and not that much of one repeat color like out of 15, 6 are pink.
customer_reviews.author: Yocelyn Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchase products to sell at our middle school store, and middle schoolers LOVE play-doh! It's hard to find play-doh affordable enough to sell tweens without a lot of pocket money, so when I find a deal this great, I buy it up. Will buy again unless they raise the price. This set also comes with gift tags, which I won't be using at the schools store, but I would consider buying them for birthday party favors for any age!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal and ideal for treasure boxes or party favors. Its Play Doh so I know what to expect when I purchase their product. My one complaint is that since the cans are so small it's very hard for smaller kids to open on their own. As an adult even I struggle prying the tops of these off and I've seen my child valiantly battle them with no success. I would say its a design flaw with the limited amount of can you have to apply leverage.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as part of a goodie bag for my daughters 1 year birthday. I spent most of the week leading up crying about the reality my baby was 1, I hadnt put as much effort into the thank you bags as I had food, decor, entertainment. I purchased this item with a few other quick finds on amazon and assembled into take home treats. It was a hit! The kids were playing together making fun creations. Even adults were having fun in.the nostalgia of play-doh. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: Playdoh in little tubs
customer_reviews.text: Used these to put in goody bags with pipe cleaners and wiggley eyes so my preschool class could make their own "monsters". It was a Halloween gift. I didn't hear any complaints, so I guess they liked it :) It is a great size to use as a favor for a party. Of if you don't want your little one to have too much Playdoh at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L

customer_reviews.title: Party favors
customer_reviews.text: Used these in goodie bags for my daughter’s birthday party. These are very small, just over 1 inch tall. Play-doh was fresh. I am giving it 4 stars because I did get 6 of the same color... I would of been pretty bummed if I had planned on keeping the pack but since it was split up between a bunch of kiddos and they were all happy. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: MammaOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome party favor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give out on Halloween, in addition to other things, for those with allergies or those who wanted it. It was a hit! It includes round stickers to write down “to” and “from” that look like they’d fit right on the lid. Good portable sizes and excellent for your play-do fix on the go! We had a few leftovers that the adults at my Halloween get together took them home.
customer_reviews.author: SirhinTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Made great party favors for a toddler party.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter's 2nd birthday as party favors. Although this particular package didn't arrive, I ended up purchasing them from somewhere else and they were perfect. The containers are very small and great for goodie bags. There's enough play doh in them for kids to enjoy it without it being enough to get on parents' nerves. They come in a variety of colors, so they're great for boys and girls without having to worry about who gets what color. A novel size when you want to give a little something fun.
customer_reviews.author: Nakki A. Price

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: To be honest this was my first time seeing these little miniature Play-Doh. They was perfect for my daughter birthday party gift bags. I love how it was very affordable and I received enough for the whole party. The Play-Doh was very soft and smelled very new. The kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiarra J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gifts
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Used it as a part of party gifts for my son's 2 year old birthday party (along with construction toys). I got 4 pink, 2 purple, 2 orange, 3 blue, 2 green and 2 yellow. I didn't mind "more" girl colors, I just made sure that those who got a pink play-doh, had a green truck. The product is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Milla

customer_reviews.title: It works out
customer_reviews.text: Love it.!! It's the best tantrum repent and distraction at the moment for my 2yrs old. It's the perfect 1oz since she goes through them quickly she loves mixing colours.. she leaves it out open so it get hard. Or I'll have to go fishing because she doesn't remember where she last put it. Clean up is also easy just let it get hard and vacuum it or pick it up before it do. I don't care much about repeating colours because she doesn't. I bought some from local store and same thing so I guess it's just a whatever you get. And again she doesn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Party Favors YES YES YES
customer_reviews.text: We gave these as party favors for our sons birthday. All the kids loved the play-doh (just glad it was not in our home). Only one was a little dry. Upon inspection the case for it had a little crack. Otherwise all the others were good. Good value for your money! Would recommend family and friends to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rainess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in a prize box for my students and they are one of the most popular items! You get 15, one-ounce cans of Play-Doh brand modeling compound. They also come with personalized sticker gift tags that can be placed on the lid of the container. There is also a terrific variety of colors in different shades (pinks, purples, greens). These are also great because of how small they are. It's not such an emergency if the lid is left off, however, the 1oz container is a good amount to keep someone busy.
customer_reviews.author: LiliBelle

customer_reviews.title: The best Halloween treat
customer_reviews.text: This year my neighborhood offered a Halloween trick-or-treating event for Differently-abled children. We were asked to provide candy and non-candy items. When presented with both bowls, almost all of the kids went for the play-doh! I was the hit of the street :). I'll be buying them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shinnick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Kids Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a prize box for kids a school. There is loads of trinkets in the box to pick from, but the play-doh is always one of the first things to go. It's a huge hit with kids. This set comes with some fun colors like dark purple and dark green. The size is great for small children too. Enough to have fun with, but not so much to make a giant mess with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon for EVERYTHING

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween Trick-or-Treaters
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to pass out to Trick-or-Treaters on Halloween... HUGE HIT with the kiddos! Kids were running down our driveway squealing "We got Play-Doh!" I didn't expect the Play-Doh to be such a favorite item. We're definitely passing out even more next year! 🎃🎃🎃
customer_reviews.author: Cristi Zbella

customer_reviews.title: Hell ya
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow. I had these for Halloween for trick or treating. These were the first items to go. All the kids were so happy. Even the parents. Hell ya 6/5 would buy again. Will buy again for Halloween. These little dudes were a favorite
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: great party favors
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my three year old's birthday party to give as party favors. The parents appreciated it wasn't some crap piece of plastic toy that would be thrown out the same day. The leftover favors were great for when we travel - my kids could have something to play with that I didn't have to worry about losing and didn't take up tons of space in our luggage.
customer_reviews.author: J. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVED these.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVED these and I loved that they didn't get stuck in my couch or carpet; BUT it HATED it at the same time! He mixed up all of the colors and wanted to play with it so often it drove me nuts! I should've been excited that he loved it more than his iPad, but my OCD made it a little difficult to. lol
customer_reviews.author: OB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: We got these to go in goodie bags for my daughter's 5th birthday. The dough was super soft and the color selection wasn't bad. She was hoping for more purple and pink. I was pleased that we got almost an even number of all the colors. These fit great into little goodie (or favor) bags and leave plenty of room to add more items if you'd like.
customer_reviews.author: J&CBaxter

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4-yo daughter because she loves to have lots of different colors. She squeeled when she saw it! Then she sat down and color matched all the stickers that come with it. Lots of fun from these. They’d be perfect as goody bag fillers too.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fun to have lots of colors, great for party favors
customer_reviews.text: These were great, perfect for party favors, or just for your child at home. The small containers were nice to limit how much she got out at once, and also having lots of different colors this was great. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Katria L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Assortment! Great Little Favors!
customer_reviews.text: As described, it is an assortment of colors. The colors did not seem overly pink or any other particular color. They are an assortment, which doesn’t guarantee any particular numbers. The value was excellent considering how expensive Play-Doh is. I used it as a party favor but I might buy some more for Halloween. They also come with tag stickers so they can be given as little gifts. They were a big hit for the kids and adults at my party.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Small but perfect for party favors!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a party favor bag for my granddaughter’s birthday party, and they were a hit! Simply adorable and a nice little size to fit in a favor bag, Christmas stocking, and many other things!
customer_reviews.author: RockAlley

customer_reviews.title: A must have for birthday party favors
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these from amazon so many times I have lost count. With the perfect amount of play dough kids love the party favors I make that are stuffed with these. The price is decent and parents are much happier for the lack of candy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love There Play-Doh
customer_reviews.text: So I am torn. I loved the little Play-doh.i didn't know if I wanted to give it a 4 or 5 star. They were used for nephews party bags. Kids loved them but more then a couple were dried out. Which sucked cuz I had to search to find little small ones in town. Which sucks cuz they were hard to find. But shipping was fast, considering I ordered last minute. Good quantity. The only down side were the ones that were dried out. But possible manufacturer issue. Other then that I would most likely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Annette Corine Thomas

customer_reviews.title: fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: i use these for fun gifts or to keep the kids busy in my homeschool coop classes, they love them and you get a lot of them for the money. they make fun gifts, favors etc. they are always a hit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great party favors!
customer_reviews.text: Used as party favors for my daughters Paw Patrol birthday party. These were small enough to fit in bags which I loved. They didn’t weight much and the kids were enjoyed them. I’d definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bday party goodie bags
customer_reviews.text: I got two bags of these to put in goodie bags for my son's third birthday party. I had two in each bag along with some stickers and everyone was very happy with them. I think it's a great value and a fun little thing for kids to do.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Borders

customer_reviews.title: Small but Cute
customer_reviews.text: As you can see these Play-Doh are very small, there small but cute in its size. The Play-Doh is very soft, it might be hard to open at first even for little kids but it helps the Play-Doh not harden up after use. These are very cute and giftable.
customer_reviews.author: KY008

customer_reviews.title: Handy little tubs of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for the purse to give to a little one when you're on-the-go. Also, great party favors. The set we received had little gift tags for names, which is a nice personal touch for party-goers.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product fast shippping
customer_reviews.text: As described, in new condition Shipped fast was expecting it to get here later but got there sooner then expected so amazing. Pack of 12 enough for Party favors :)
customer_reviews.author: N.RMZ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and just enough
customer_reviews.text: Non of them were dry and they had a perfect personal amount for the little ones to use! We had a party in a hotel room and they had enough to keep to their own little designs but still have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sher1012

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my 2 year old’s Valentines Day party at his school. They were the perfect size for toddlers and a great alternative to the traditional candy Valentine.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quantity
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are great for party favors, or just to keep in your purse to entertain kids when out at dinner. They are a great price for the quantity. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: shay8911

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I love this package of play doh. There is a wide variety of colors. It’s perfect for my daughter who tends to let the play doh dry out or mixes the colors together. I just give her about 3 colors at a time to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a diaper bag!!
customer_reviews.text: We keep these everywhere for our 2 year old (diaper bag, my purse, in the car, etc). They are small and you get a lot of containers in this pack! We took several of these to Disney and shared with our friends’ kids while we waited in lines for rides - a huge hit!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 4 year old nieces love playdoh but don't always remember to put it away. These are just big enough to play with but small enough that it's not a huge waste when lids don't get put on.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Little prizes for my daughter, who loves Play Doh. Shipped and arrived quickly. Bag is very well sealed, as are the containers, so it's super fresh. I was surprised to see there are name labels in the bag to use for party favors! So cute! I'll probably re-purchase for her next birthday. But just FYI, parents and caregivers, there are a lot of neon and dark colors in this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great size for busy bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to pack in activity bags for a flight and family vacation. They were on sale for a great price. I have enough to use for several trips. I did receive many multiples of some colors, but all in all very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ambervb

customer_reviews.title: Tops hard to open, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: What you expect from playdoh. None dried out. Stickers are just the right size (though that can make them hard to put on). I wish the stickers said "From" and not "To and From" but that's just me hating to leave a blank or keep bags separated by child
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mini sizes that I keep around for the 4yr old to play with. One small one until it dries up. Then later I’ll let her have another. Also have given away in goody bags for birthday parties.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Love this little kit
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playdoh and this little kit has multiple colors for him to play with! Easy to shape and mold and the variety of colors is amazing! For 5 bucks you can't beat it! It's comes in a plastic pouch type bag i get a few out a day for my some to play with and he loves them . Not sticky or smelly I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: FUN - but very small
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I would say that it was worth the amount as I could have got the same package for much less at a local store. But kids and play doh go hand in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Beaird

customer_reviews.title: It's PlayDoh. How can you go wrong?
customer_reviews.text: It was a big hit in the goodie bags. All the kids I know love PlayDoh and these little pots are just the right size. It would also do well for stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Party favors, goody bags, Halloween giveaways, travel
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent price! Excellent PlayDoh Quality, each is individually packaged so you can break them up and put in goody bags, take a few when travelling, etc. Much less expensive than in store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy a second one to stop the fights! :-)
customer_reviews.text: I teach third grade and this game is THE hit game for indoor recess. There are tournaments and arguments over who gets to play next. So I bought a second one, and now they are both in use every time! Loved by all my 8-9 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeMom

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Mini~Play-Doh, Perfect Party Favors! See Photo.......
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute for my granddaughter's 4th birthday party bags. Lots of fun and the To & From stickers were cute too. Nice touch for everyone's bags to have something inside with their name on it. It was a small party so I have plenty left over but will order more again when we run out. Uploading a photo so you can see just how tiny these are. Smile. Buy with confidence. Purchased from seller Great Price Fast Service. Hope this is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: MariamG

customer_reviews.title: Mystery bag
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived later than expected. This was intended as a Christmas gift, upon opening the bag it said “Happy Halloween”. The colors inside were all Halloween related (purple, black, orange, green). The bag had a sticker half peeled off that was the price tag for an item sitting on a shelf at a store. The package was also ripped in the front. Not the product I was expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay H

customer_reviews.title: 0.30 cents a pice
customer_reviews.text: $.30 cents per container is a great deal, I bought it as an add-on item for less than $5.00 the 15 pieces, is even convenient because my baby won’t play with a big container but better with smaller quantities so it will last longer as It tends to dry up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Cute little playdohs
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for party favors. They're just the right size to put in a goodie bag and enough playdoh to have fun with. They even come with little round stickers to place on lid of individual playdohs that say "TO: FROM:" to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size playdohs for party favors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size playdohs for party favors, easter egg hunts, etc. I buy these regularly for my daughter's class events and birthdays. They fit in the large easter eggs and are the perfect item when required to bring in non-food easter eggs to school. We used them this time as a party favor for her birthday. The extras will be included in her valentine's goody bags.
customer_reviews.author: MamaCD

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lot of playdoh for an activity for my students and I didn't want to spend a lot of money or have a lot left over, so this was a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Party Bag Filler
customer_reviews.text: We used these to fill party bags. It is a fun toy that keeps kids entertained for a while.
customer_reviews.author: ebilbo

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I used these to add to favor bags at my daughter school party. I love the fact that they come with stickers to place at the top where u can write in to and from on the little tubs.
customer_reviews.author: JHH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for favor bags! Also great to give in portions to a fussy toddler without having a massive ball of play doh out
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition with no damage. Playdoh is soft and squishy not dried out or stale at all. Good product for the price that will get lots of use in our household!
customer_reviews.author: Weston & Lacey Jones

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Play-doh??? I plan to use in my classroom for students who need to fidget. Will also place in treasure box AND give out for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mazzuco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Goody Bag Size, but I was missing one from the bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for goody bags for my daughter's classmates, dance class members, gymnastics class members and her playmates. I love that these are tiny cans of play doh, they are perfect for giving to kids, not too big or bulky. The size would also accomodate a mom's purse, if need be. The one thing reason why I deducted a star is because each bag is suppose to have 15 cans and one of my bags only had 14. Initially, I thought that I had opened it or maybe the nanny, but as I inspected the bag, it had not been opened or unsealed in any manner and was short one little can of the play doh.
customer_reviews.author: R. Robin

customer_reviews.title: Classroom Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy purchase I needed multiple colors for a project in my high school geography class. This worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this was a bad batch or something but the little bits of Play-Doh in each canister are extremely sticky and difficult to get out and sticks to fingers, clothes and everything it touches. Not like the Play-Doh I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: LJK

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: i’m a school bus driver and i’m giving to my kids for christmas... there cute and just the right size for my elementary kids!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Who Doesn't Love Play-doh?
customer_reviews.text: Always a great party favor or gift, and they come with these cute little stickers that you can write a recipients name and who the gift is from. They were fresh and not hard and a great color assortment.
customer_reviews.author: Tyria Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Play-Doh Good Value
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like Play-doh Party Bag! it can be given out at parties, or used at home. Kids love Play-Doh!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Got these for birthday party gift bags and they were a good addition. They are each about 1/3 or 1/4 the size of a full play doh but fun to have so many different colors and a good price
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: Play-doh for party favors
customer_reviews.text: Love this party pack. It is great for small favor bags: holidays at school or birthdays. Or, for travelling, day trips, outdoors play dates. They are just great and the right size for out-of-home activities.
customer_reviews.author: MommyIt

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 4 year old that really can not live without play doh lol. So much better to give her the small container at a time and comes with cute stickers for the tops of each! Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Bussey

customer_reviews.title: Fun give away
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters birthday thank you bags! Perfect size, right price, kids always love! Great for any occasion you are giving something away.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know you can give them out as gifts comes with the sticker sheet to give them out as birthday gifts quantity is good son was happy
customer_reviews.author: Lyly garza

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It does what it says. Little tough to get out of the small containers but nice to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Children love playdough.play dough. Hit in party bags.  ts
customer_reviews.text: Just big enough for gift bags, Easter baskets, and Christmas stockings. Nice array of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Party or Class Party Favor (includes TO, FROM stickers!)
customer_reviews.text: These cute little play doh canisters come with to-from birthday themed stickers. Perfect for class parties or party favors! I bought these to give to my sons class for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 n a half year old son for christmas and hes into play dough and teaching him to play with it its fun with all the different colirs and was such a greatchouce and great price as well for all of these in a bundle thank you we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Parmar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: Included these in a birthday party favor bag and they were such a hit with the kids. I loved how small they were. The only downside was that the labels that went along with the mini tubs were bent. But, they were still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved these little jars of playdough. They were perfect for my daughters goodies bags she gave out at her birthday party. They also came with some birthday stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay for your little one. They are really small though. Not what I expected but doable for a piñata.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good colors good price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the multipack. These are perfect to keep in the car or in a travel bag to entertain the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Found cheaper locally
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with PlayDoh unless you overpay. I did but was able to return it without incident.
customer_reviews.author: mbdayz

customer_reviews.title: So many fun and unusual colors!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My Halloween guests will be thrilled. I participate in "the Teal Pumpkin Project" so this will be a great addition to my giveaways. Lots of different (and some duplicates) in one package.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love the size!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my toddler who's favorite toy is clay! She likes to mix up the colors and since there are so many colors she plays and mixes them for hours. The quality is great! Great purchase! would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Gift bag/ party favors
customer_reviews.text: Great for gift bags/party favors! They actually come with to/from stickers that fit the lid of the play dough. Fun idea for non candy treats for school/holidays etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Play doh as promised
customer_reviews.text: This play doh was exactly as described and left my 5 year old very happy at Christmas. The doh was fresh and bright colored. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: OSULYNDSAY

customer_reviews.title: Hit with the younger kids
customer_reviews.text: The kids in my my daughter’s class were so excited to get play dough. It was a much better option than just candy for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for yet another birthday. Every chance I get I buy more perfect to go in goodie bags and for rewards! Love that they come with birthday stickers too can’t go wrong with Playdoh 👌
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie

customer_reviews.title: Great for goody bags
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for party favor bag and a great value. My kids have been using the extras we had and I didn’t notice a difference in consistency as another review said.
customer_reviews.author: JessLV

customer_reviews.title: who doesn't love play-doh?!
customer_reviews.text: my toddler loves to play with this stuff so the portability of these smaller containers are wonderful. i love giving these away in lieu of candy for daycare and birthday parties. another plus is that they have an amazing shelf life. i bought several packages to give out for halloween long before i had kids and just recently came upon some unopened bags and they're STILL good! whenever the price is right, i just stockpile them because they're pretty much the perfect toy.
customer_reviews.author: boomer sooner

product_meta.title: Play-Doh Party Bag Dough (15 Count)
product_meta.description:
Style:15 PackShare the fun and share the creativity with this Party Bag full of 15 cans of Play Doh modeling compound. Featuring gift tags on the top of each one, these brightly colored cans are perfect for passing out to your friends at your next party. You can each mold cool things on your own or combine to create one giant, amazing creation! Moms are sure to love these, too, and grab one on the go to keep imaginative kids entertained anywhere. Bag contains 15 one ounce cans of Play Doh brand modeling compound.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Share the fun and share the creativity with this Party Bag full of 15 cans of Play-Doh modeling compound. Featuring gift tags on the top of each one, these brightly colored cans are perfect for passing out to your friends at your next party. You can each mold cool things on your own or combine to create one giant, amazing creation. Moms are sure to love these, too and grab one on-the-go to keep imaginative kids entertained anywhere.
feature_bullets: Bag contains 15 one ounce cans of Play Doh brand modeling compound
Great for party favors and school gifts
Includes 15 one ounce cans of Play Doh modeling compound and personalized gift tags
